name: AIR ENGINEERS, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C. J., and WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: AIR ENGINEERS, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
The order of the Commonwealth Court, 397 A.2d 854, is affirmed.
O’BRIEN, C. J., and WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Patrick M. Reb, Lebanon, for appellant.
Paul S. Roeder, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
428 A.2d 1341
AIR ENGINEERS, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 28, 1981.
Decided May 11, 1981.
Patrick M. Reb, Lebanon, for appellant.
Paul S. Roeder, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
